segments.text: I see the water just pouring out of the sink like a waterfall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman doesn’t even seem to notice it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just standing there, drying that plate like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and she has no clue.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far to reach the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I’m afraid he’s going to fall any second now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for him to hand her a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm she is while her brother is about to crash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kitchen is a mess, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I don’t know how much longer I can watch this.
segments.speaker: PAR
